question:
Which of the following statements are correct about the Tropical rain forest?
1) Temperature and rainfall high.
2) Tropical rainforest covers about 7% of the earth’s surface & 40% of the world’s plant and animal species.
3) Epiphytic plants are absent.
Select the correct answer from the codes given below:
explanation: Tropical areas are present in the equatorial regions, which are characterized by High Temperature and rainfall. Tropical rainforest covers about 7% of the earth’s surface & 40% of the world’s plant and animal species. Most animals and epiphytic plants are concentrated in the canopy or treetop zones.
